resources.string: Swipe to the left to see a few hints on using this app.
To increase the brightness of the clock, slide you finger up the screen.
To decrease the brightness of the clock, slide you finger down the screen.
To invert the clock brightness, double tap on the screen.
To exit Just 24 Hours, swipe from left to right quickly.
